CustomField.description: This field tells you the date that we would like to see the deal in contract, based on the process described in the Contract/Addendum field.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Contract_Addendum__c, "Order only - no terms changes (for customers)"), CloseDate - 5, IF(ISPICKVAL(Contract_Addendum__c, "Amendment - no lawyer involved (for customers)"), CloseDate - 7, IF(ISPICKVAL(Contract_Addendum__c, "Amendment - lawyer involved (for customers)"), CloseDate - 14, IF(ISPICKVAL(Contract_Addendum__c, "Contract - without procurement (for prospects)"), CloseDate - 14, IF(ISPICKVAL(Contract_Addendum__c, "Contract - with procurement (for prospects)"), CloseDate - 30, NULL)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field tells you the date that we would like to see the deal in contract, based on the process described in the Contract/Addendum field.
CustomField.label: In Contract Target Date
